name: wikiatlas
main: Wikimaps Atlas (2015) is a piece of code to output nice web-friendly maps, administrative and physical. It installs relevant GIS resources, software dependencies, then can be ran on demand for a target area. See README.md for the API.
author: Hugo lopez <hugo.lpz@gmail.com>
Arun Ganesh <arun.planemad@gmail.com>
